title: Gnome Bumblebee Pot Holders, Set of 2 Cotton Potholders for Kitchen Decor
features: Multi-Purpose: This set of 2 pot holders are thick but high quality cotton fabric, making it comfortable enough to easily hold pots, pans, or any cookware. At 7.5 inches square, they work great as hot pads, mug rugs, and coasters. The cute print on each pot holder makes them ideal for kitchen decor.

Heat Resistant: Our pot holders are made with 5 layers of materials for great heat protection. The front and back layers are 100% cotton fabric while the inner lining consists of 2 layers of cotton batting and one layer of a special heat-resistant batting called Insul-Bright. These layers combine to provide heat resistance up to 450 degrees heat.

Durable: Not only are our pot holders made of high quality materials, they are carefully sewn and quilted to last. All of our pot holders are made in the USA one-by-one with attention to detail and care.
Easy Storage: As our pot holders are both functional and decorative, you can place them anywhere in your kitchen, they add beauty to your space. Each pot holder has a sewn fabric loop for hanging.

Easy Care: To keep them looking new, we recommend hand-washing and air-drying however you can also machine wash these pot holders. Machine-wash in cold water then tumble dry on low temperature. The pot holders are NOT microwavable.
description: Our Gnome Bumblebee Pot Holders/Hot Pads are handmade and quilted with high quality cotton fabric. Each pot holder is filled with 2 layers of cotton batting and 1 layer of thermal lining for extra heat resistance. Measuring at about 7.5 inches square, these pot holders serve as functional and decorative kitchen accessories.
details: {"Package Dimensions": "9 x 9 x 0.5 inches; 3 Ounces", "Date First Available": "April 22, 2022"}
